name: Smart Electrical Energy Monitoring System
desc: Energy consumption data is read from multiple smart energy meters using Siemens s7-1200 PLC via MODBUS RTU. Data is then sent to Thingsboard cloud via Node-Red as MQTT client. Both local and cloud dashboard is designed.

name: Cloud based OEE Monitoring for CNC Machine
desc: HAAS CNC CM-1 Machine parameters are read via MTConnect, Ethernet and HTTP request using Node-red as server. The data is then used to calculate OEE parameters. The data is sent to Thingsboard cloud and dashboard is designed.

name: ThingsBoard White Labeling
desc: White labeling, custom logo, custom widget, text, and UI developed on top of Thingboard CE. Changes are tested in Docker.

name: Collaborative Robot Programming
desc: Programming of a Neuromeka COBOT for pick and place task

name: Manufacturing of a pesticide spraying drone for agricultural application
desc: I have modified the design of F550 hexacopter frame and built control system to carry and spray pesticide

name: Improving Efficiency Of Agricultural Irrigation Pumps By Manufacturing Impellers Using 3D PrintingÂ Technology
desc: I have modified the casting process to manufacture centrifugal pump impellers. I have introduced 3D printing for pattern manufacturing, which resulted in higher efficiency of the pump
